info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 7:57PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hamilton and Franklin Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 755 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Mcleansboro to near Valier. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Benton, Mcleansboro, Rend Lake Area, Sesser, Valier, and Broughton. This includes Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 70 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
